tool.name: qiime2 feature-table rename-ids
tool.description: Renames sample or feature ids in a table

param.name: type
param.label: metadata: MetadataColumn[Categorical]
param.help: [required] A metadata column defining the new ids. Each original id must map to a new unique id. If strict mode is used, then every id in the original table must have a new id.

validator.message: The first column cannot be selected (they are IDs).

param.name: axis
param.label: axis: Str % Choices('feature', 'sample')
param.help: [default: 'sample'] Along which axis to rename the ids.

param.name: strict
param.label: strict: Bool
param.help: [default: No] Whether the naming needs to be strict (each id in the table must have a new id). Otherwise, only the ids described in `metadata` will be renamed and the others will keep their original id names.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: feature-table rename-ids ================================= Renames sample or feature ids in a table
Outputs: -------- :renamed_table.qza: A table which has new ids, where the ids are replaced by values in the `metadata` column.
|
Description: ------------ Renames the sample or feature ids in a feature table using metadata to define the new ids.
|
